description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Lentil Casserole with Cauliflower Patties recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Lentil Casserole with Cauliflower Patties Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup coriander leaves, roughly chopped (extra coriander leaves to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, ginger and garlic and cook, stirring often, for 34 minutes or until soft. Stir through seasoning.

Add lentils and 3 cups water. Bring to the boil, reduce heat to low and simmer, covered for 1 hour or until lentils are tender. Check lentils often to make sure all liquid has not evaporated. Season well with salt and pepper.
Meanwhile, bring a saucepan of water to the boil. Add cauliflower and cook for 45 minutes or until tender. Drain and roughly chop. Transfer to a large bowl to cool.
Sift flour over cauliflower. Add coriander, parmesan and egg. Season with salt and pepper. Add 2 tablespoons of water and stir until a thick batter forms.

Add enough oil to a saucepan or frying pan to cover base. Drop cups of mixture into oil, cooking 34 at a time, for 2-3 minutes on each side or until golden. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm, whilst you cook remaining fritters.
Spoon rice onto serving plates. Top with cooked lentils and cauliflower patties.
Add a dollop of yoghurt and coriander.
